title: Angular
details: Angular has been my main focus over the past two years, having started the transition prior to the Alpha release I feel I have the edge on all others in my skill range.

title: Apache
details: Apache has been my go-to server for all the php applications that I have developed through-out my career. I have recently been exploring better alternatives, such as ngix, however I feel this will always be a solid pick due to the level of support provided.

title: Illustrator
details: I starting creating mathematical illustrations right out of high school, and have gained much proficiency with this tool since. Although I am yet to truely test my skills with more creative art pieces.

title: Typescript
details: Learnt in conjunction with Angular, Type-safety has significantly improved my efficiency in front-end development... It's a presure to work with on up-scaled applications.

title: jQuery
details: I started my career with this technology, and it is great for small-scale applications, however with the swift evolution of javascript in the past years, there are better technologies out there, with this said I can maintain and facilitate the transition from jQuery.
